hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOOF.EOOF_ID, EOOF.CREATOR, EOOF.CREATE_TIME, EOOF.MODIFIER, EOOF.MODIFY_TIME, EOOF.REC_VER, EOOF.REC_STATUS, EOOF.ORG_ID, EOOF.PM_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_ORDER_NO, EOOF.EOOF_FEE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_FEE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_FEE_TYPE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_FEE_TYPE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_RP_FLAG_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_RP_FLAG_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_PARTY_TYPE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_PARTY_TYPE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_PARTY_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_PARTY_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_MEASURE_TYPE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_MEASURE_TYPE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_QUANTITY, EOOF.EOOF_PRICE, EOOF.EOOF_AMOUNT, EOOF.EOOF_CURRENCY_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_CURRENCY_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_RATE, EOOF.EOOF_ROUND_TYPE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_ROUND_TYPE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_RP_METHOD_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_RP_METHOD_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_RP_AMOUNT, EOOF.EOOF_STATUS_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_STATUS_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_SOURCE_CODE, EOOF.EOOF_SOURCE_NAME, EOOF.EOOF_REMARK from EO_ORDER_FEE EOOF WHERE 1=1 << AND EOOF.ORG_ID=:orgId>> << AND EOOF.EOOF_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoofOrderNo>> << AND EOOF.EOOF_ORDER_NO IN (:eoofOrderNos)>> << AND EOOF.EOOF_RP_FLAG_CODE LIKE :eoofRpFlagCode>> << AND EOOF.EOOF_PARTY_CODE LIKE :eoofPartyCode>> AND EOOF.EOOF_STATUS_CODE!='SYS_OMS_FEE_SUBMIT'
